titleStmt.title: An examination of a late treatise of the gout wherein John Colbatch's demonstrations are briefly refuted, the College cleared from his scandalous imputations; and a short account of his vulnerary powder. By S. W. no inconsiderable branch of the College.
titleStmt.author: S. W.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed, for the author, and sold by the booksellers of London and Westminster,

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Colbatch, John. A treatise of the gout. (Cf. Wing C5013).
The "College" of the title is the Royal College of Physicians, London.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford.
